summary.blockquote: WARNINGWarning: This interface is deprecated in the Navigation Timing Level 2 specification. Please use the interface instead.

remarks.para: The PerformanceTiming interface is a legacy interface kept for backwards compatibility and contains properties that offer performance timing information for various events which occur during the loading and use of the current page. You get a PerformanceTiming object describing your page using the property.

-The property that creates such an object.
- (part of Navigation Timing Level 2) that has superseded this API.
